name: Stonefox Reign
description:
This game has been released in very early access, if you have any feedback, either let us know at our email foxalopegames@gmail.com or let us know on our discussion board

WASD / Arrow Keys to move.

R to Use Magical Essence to Restart a Maze.

Credit is shown in-game.

We now have a discord channel at https://discord.gg/8P9wNAm
